pokerapp.console

Class Players

  • Object
    • Players
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Player>

    public class Players
extends Object
implements Iterable<Player>
    Holds players for the poker app, is able to compare to pick a winning player
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steve

      • pickWinner

        public Player pickWinner()
        Uses the current players to pick a winner
        Returns:
        the player that has the highest ranking

      • pickWinner

        protected Player pickWinner(Player lhs,
                Player rhs)
        When passed two players, will compare the hand category grade of the two players for a hand of poker, and return which of them compares higher
        Parameters:
        lhs - player one
        rhs - player two
        Returns:
        the player with the higher hand grade TODO: and their score?
